About Tred

Tred is mobile banking app that allows users and businesses to monitor and understand the impact their spending has on the environment.

My role

I was a Software Developer Intern at Tred from October 2022 to April 2023.

My tasks

  • Built new components with React Native and Typescript, and extended existing ones
  • Wrote end-to-end tests for a cross-platform mobile app with Detox, and unit tests with Jest
  • Queried, updated and inserted data in a PostgreSQL database with TypeORM
  • Tracked file changes with Git and pushed code to multiple branches
  • Worked on setting up a Detox CI pipeline with GitHub Actions to automate tests
  • Got exposed to EC2, Lambda, CloudWatch and Cognito in AWS
